ygData.subject: Order of receiving messges on this list (off-topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: I was just wondering if anyone else is experiencing the same thing I am on this message list when it comes to the order I receive the emails. I have noticed
ygData.messageBody:
I was just wondering if anyone else is experiencing the same thing I am on
this message list when it comes to the order I receive the emails.

I have noticed that frequently I receive the reply to a post before I
receive the initial post. It isn't that big of a deal but I'm just curious
if everyone else is experiencing the same thing. If I'm the only one
getting the order of messages out of whack, then my email server is most
likely the culprit. If it is affecting everyone else then it probably has
something to do with how Onelist forwards the messages.

I'm a grad student working on my degree in information systems and when I
can't figure this kind of stuff out it bugs the crap out of me. Thanks
ahead for anyone who can shed some light.

Galtin
E'ci
